Class Author

java.lang.Object
Author
public class Author extends Object
A class that operates as an Author. It contains fields for a first name, a last name and the authors address. There is also an ArrayList to specify materials written in library that is associated with the Resource object.
Version:
0.5 (28/11/23)
Author:
Robert Mackie

  • Method Details

    • getFullName

      public String getFullName()
      Show the authors fullname by concatenating the string values in fName and lName data fields.
      Returns:
      String getfullName Returns the authors full name

    • getAddress

      public String getAddress()
      Show the Authors Address
      Returns:
      String getAddress Reuturns the authors address value.

    • addResource

      public void addResource(Resource resource, Author author)
      This method adds a resource to Arraylist of Materials written, while also calling the updateAuthor method in the resource class.
      Parameters:
      resource - The resource/material to be attributed to the Author
      Author - The Author the resource is to be attributed to.

    • showDetails

      public void showDetails()
      This method displays the details of this Author object by printing them to the terminal.

    • printMaterials

      public void printMaterials()
      This method will display the details of any resource object in the Materials written ArrayList in the Author class . Prints out inherited values of the resource class through calling printDetails method and cycles through specific instances of each resource.
